tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: What do you see inside the bottle?

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Identify the only island that has all three of the bottle elements.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Sand, shell and sunflower.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is TOP. Take films with letters TOP and attach them to the tag on the bottle.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Wrap the note around the bottle.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Connect the end of the note to the word "Alec" and read the resulting word.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is HOT. Peel off the sticker from the laptop screen

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Follow the route described on the map from the stone to the hut, picking up letters along the way.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is HOME.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The points of the star resemble the wigwams.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Attach a star to each wigwam. The arrow will point to the desired object.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: You received five items - a bonfire, a skull, a starfish, a shovel, and a chest. Convert each item into a letter using the matrix provided on the envelope.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is FLAME. Attach to the envelope with a star.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Place the octagon in the center of the map and read the first word in the holes. Rotate the octagon to reveal the remaining seven words.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Write the words you obtained into the circles on the envelope, matching each word with its corresponding number.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: For each pair of words, select a word that connects them in meaning. Continue until you reach the central answer word.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: Lightning + Rain = STORM. Attach to the envelope with an octagon.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Attach the circle to the lake in a way that duplicates the eyes on the envelope.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The stones on the lakeside point to the letters.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: You get the word tree. Attach the circle to the envelope. The trees point to the correct letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is FISH. Attach to an envelope with a circle.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: Take the films from each of the three envelopes and attach them to the envelope #5.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Connect the base, pin, octagon, circle, and star into a single structure.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: For each of the tasks (I, II, III) set a certain relative position of the octagon and the circle.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: Align the lotus symbol on the octagon with the letter on the circle highlighted in red in the word lotus.|I: T|II: O|III: S

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Start with the symbol above the matrix circle.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Find and cross out all the cells with the triangle symbol in the matrix circle.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: You get an arrow. Cross out all the cells with the arrow symbol.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: You get the letter o. Cross out all the cells with the letter o.

tips.name: Tip 5
tips.text: You get: arrow -> letter O -> desired character.

tips.name: Tip 6
tips.text: Place the combination on the spinning decoder. The points of the star indicate the letters of the answer.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer to the first stage is THREE.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: What do you see in the picture?

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: They are nail, palm and arms.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: These words have other meanings. Find them on the octagon.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Use the spinning decoder according to the lotus instructions. The symbols will point to letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The second stage answer is SIX.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Only four of the seven tokens are correct.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Idioms with colour and object will help you.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Black sheep, white elephant, blue moon, golden handshake.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Use the spinning decoder according to the lotus instructions. The symbols will point to the letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer to the third stage is FIVE.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: You get: I — THREE, II — SIX, III — FIVE.  Тhree hundred sixty five.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is YEAR.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Attach the squares to the map so that you get a coherent picture.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Follow the path from the hut to the volcano cave and collect the letters along the way.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is IDOL.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Assemble the totem and the spinning decoder. Place it in the centre of the map so that the desired rune points to the north.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Identify three correct totem deities.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Place the totem on the map in the required direction. Which rune of the octagon does the arrow of the star point to?

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Find the obtained rune on the totem itself. What part of the totem is it on? Identify the letter from the matrix.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is GOD.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Wipe the totem wings with a wet wipe.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The scales appeared on the right wing, the sword on the left.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: What do such symbols represent?

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is JUSTICE.
